remarks: The orthocomplement operation.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ocvfval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ocvfval.i $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
ocvfval.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ocvfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
ocvfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
ocvfval $p |- ( W e. X -> ._|_ = ( s e. ~P V |-> { x e. V | A. y e. s ( x ., y ) = .0. } ) ) $.
$d ., s x y $.
$d .0. s x y $.
$d V s x y $.
$d W s x y $.
